transArray.content:
Convenient transportation from the subway near
There are shopping malls around, convenient for shopping and eating
The hotel is relatively new and the sound insulation is ok
Breakfast is also rich
The only problem is that the air is too dry at night and I can't sleep. Turning off the air conditioner is useless. I don't know if it's the bad weather in Beijing or something. It is recommended to add a humidifier
